function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear and direct information policies on pandemic management","Impact":"Misinformation and confusion among citizens, leading to risky behaviors","Mitigation":"Implement clear, direct, and timely information policies on pandemic management","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, data analytics for targeted messaging","People":"General population","Owner":"Authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Low quality and veracity of Internet information","Impact":"Spread of false information and conspiracy theories, leading to distrust in official sources","Mitigation":"Improve the quality and veracity of Internet information through fact-checking and verification processes","Technologies":"Fact-checking algorithms, content moderation tools","People":"General population","Owner":"Internet and media organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of access to specific recommendations and official sources on the internet and media","Impact":"Inability to access reliable guidance and information, leading to uncertainty and reliance on unverified sources","Mitigation":"Provide specific recommendations and direct citizens to official and reliable sources through internet and media platforms","Technologies":"Online recommendation systems, targeted advertising, information portals","People":"General population","Owner":"Internet and media organizations"}]}
